{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances    #-}
{-# LANGUAGE TypeSynonymInstances #-}

module StringConversions where

import Prelude (String, (.), id)

import qualified Data.ByteString.Char8      as BS
import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8 as LBS
import qualified Data.Text                  as T
import qualified Data.Text.Encoding         as T
import qualified Data.Text.Lazy             as LT
import qualified Data.Text.Lazy.Encoding    as LT

class ConvertibleStrings a b where
  cs :: a -> b

instance ConvertibleStrings String          String         where cs = id
instance ConvertibleStrings String          BS.ByteString  where cs = BS.pack
instance ConvertibleStrings String          LBS.ByteString where cs = LBS.pack
instance ConvertibleStrings String          T.Text         where cs = T.pack
instance ConvertibleStrings String          LT.Text        where cs = LT.pack

instance ConvertibleStrings BS.ByteString   BS.ByteString  where cs = id
instance ConvertibleStrings BS.ByteString   LBS.ByteString where cs = LBS.fromStrict

instance ConvertibleStrings LBS.ByteString  BS.ByteString  where cs = LBS.toStrict
instance ConvertibleStrings LBS.ByteString  LBS.ByteString where cs = id

instance ConvertibleStrings T.Text          String         where cs = T.unpack
instance ConvertibleStrings T.Text          BS.ByteString  where cs = T.encodeUtf8
instance ConvertibleStrings T.Text          LBS.ByteString where cs = cs . T.encodeUtf8
instance ConvertibleStrings T.Text          T.Text         where cs = id
instance ConvertibleStrings T.Text          LT.Text        where cs = LT.fromStrict

instance ConvertibleStrings LT.Text         String         where cs = LT.unpack
instance ConvertibleStrings LT.Text         BS.ByteString  where cs = cs . LT.encodeUtf8
instance ConvertibleStrings LT.Text         LBS.ByteString where cs = LT.encodeUtf8
instance ConvertibleStrings LT.Text         T.Text         where cs = LT.toStrict
instance ConvertibleStrings LT.Text         LT.Text        where cs = id

toString        :: ConvertibleStrings a              String         => a              -> String
toText          :: ConvertibleStrings a              T.Text         => a              -> T.Text
toLText         :: ConvertibleStrings a              LT.Text        => a              -> LT.Text
toByteString    :: ConvertibleStrings a              BS.ByteString  => a              -> BS.ByteString
toLByteString   :: ConvertibleStrings a              LBS.ByteString => a              -> LBS.ByteString
fromString      :: ConvertibleStrings String         b              => String         -> b
fromText        :: ConvertibleStrings T.Text         b              => T.Text         -> b
fromLText       :: ConvertibleStrings LT.Text        b              => LT.Text        -> b
fromByteString  :: ConvertibleStrings BS.ByteString  b              => BS.ByteString  -> b
fromLByteString :: ConvertibleStrings LBS.ByteString b              => LBS.ByteString -> b
toString        = cs
toText          = cs
toLText         = cs
toByteString    = cs
toLByteString   = cs
fromString      = cs
fromText        = cs
fromLText       = cs
fromByteString  = cs
fromLByteString = cs
